item.description:
Join the folks from the Greater Boston Scooter Club for their monthly "Take your scooter to breakfast" event, being held at the IHOP in Brighton, a 15 min scoot from Harvard Square.

This should prove to be a great scooter breakfast event and a way for the two clubs to meet and greet. Last month we had 15 show up for breakfast at a diner in Watertown, and now with CityScoots we figured we needed a larger venue.

There are plenty of tables and lots of room, and pancakes are just flat out fun!

Hope to see you there!

Doug
item.why: Ask someone who went to the last Take your scooter to breakfast event ! !
item.name: The Monthly " Take your Scooter to Breakfast "
